config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'gi.igi.samples' is used in the code to set the number of photons for InstantGI. It retrieves the value from the 'options' object using the key 'gi.igi.samples'.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the 'gi.igi.samples' configuration depends on when the InstantGI object is instantiated with the 'Options' object. It will be triggered whenever an InstantGI object is created with new options.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'gi.igi.samples' configuration option is significant as it determines the number of photons used for InstantGI calculations. A higher value will result in more accurate global illumination but may also increase computation time and memory usage.
